resources.string: "You can launch emergency dialer using "Emergency call" button on the lockscreen or long power button press"
"You can not use %1$s as wipe PIN. It is emergency number"
"%1$s PIN used to wipe device in emergency call"
"%1$s passphrase used to wipe device in lockscreen"
"Enter passphrase in lockscreen to destroy all data.\nWARNING! Wipe passphrase will be destroyed if you select another unlock method(e.g. pin or pattern)"
Current lockscreen method is not password
Wipe password can not be same with current lockscreen password
"Please wait and try again in %1$d seconds"
"Automatically lock device if it will be used more than the selected duration of time"
